Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize AI analysis for shorter, more concise responses

The AI was generating excessively long analysis that wasn''t user-friendly. This update makes responses more actionable and readable while preserving essential market context.

Changes:
- Reduce maxTokens from 4000 to 1500 for balanced analysis length
- Reduce timeout from 90s to 60s \(shorter responses complete faster\)
- Update system prompt to emphasize concise, efficient analysis
- Modify output format to request 2-3 paragraph reasoning \(down from unlimited\)
- Limit keyFactors to 3-6 focused points instead of unlimited
- Remove "NO LENGTH CONSTRAINTS" instructions that encouraged verbosity
- Keep all three primary objectives: hawkish/dovish, CB move, smart money flow
- Maintain focus on actionable insights and essential market context

Result: Analysis now provides clear, focused insights without overwhelming detail.
